It’s been an exciting week, and not just because of the buzz leading us to Super Bowl LX on Sunday. To start, we got the first early-bird perk offers for Velotric’s upcoming Discover 3 and Discover M e-bikes, while also continuing Valentine’s Day sales, like Lectric announcing this as the final weekend to jump on the current $753 savings, while Heybike is offering two ALPHA all-terrain mid-drive e-bikes at $999 each, not to mention the many Segway e-scooter discounts we spotted.

We also got some big power station news, with increased exclusive savings to new low prices on EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Ultra home backup bundle, as well as the DELTA Pro Ultra X power station. However, the biggest buzz came from Anker officially opening its new E10 Smart Hybrid Whole-Home Backup System for purchase with $2,846+ savings. All that and so much more are waiting for you below!

more…

items.title: Anker’s new SOLIX E10 smart hybrid whole-home backup system opens for purchase with $2,846+ savings from $4,299
items.summary:
It’s been nearly a month since it was first opened for pre-order, and now Anker SOLIX has officially launched its new E10 Smart Hybrid Whole-Home Backup System, starting at $4,299 shipped and also getting $1,346 in FREE add-on accessories. Of course, if you jumped on the brand’s early pre-order promotion, you’ll also be getting some additional savings through your registered email, which you can use up until the end of the month. The base setup for this new system (the module and one battery) will carry a $5,799 full price once these launch discounts fade, but for folks who missed out on the pre-order offer, it’s still a solid $1,500 price cut alongside $1,346 in bundled items (a 400W solar panel, AC generator adapter cable, a 120V/240V power strip, and a metal pad) for a combined $2,846 in savings – and more for folks who did pre-order! This sets the bar for future discounts throughout the rest of the year and beyond, so head below to learn more about this system and also to browse the larger bundle options that are also seeing discounts.

items.summary:
Amazon is offering a great means to keep your floors clean at a budget-friendly price on the roborock Q7 M5+ Robot Vacuum and Mop for $249.99 shipped, which matches the price we’re seeing direct from the brand’s website. It’s down from its $430 full price here, which we did see go as low as $220 back during Black Friday and Christmas sales. If you missed out on those lower rates from 2025, you’re still getting a solid $180 markdown here that drops costs among its lowest tracked prices, especially if you don’t want to shell out money for newer models like the brand’s latest Qrevo Curv 2 Flow robot that only recently hit the market.

items.summary:
Waterpik Aquarius Water Flosser

Buy for $60 (Reg. $80)

What we love

Flossing is the most underrated part of oral hygiene, in my opinion, and while standard string floss is better than nothing, upgrading to this water flosser is a far better decision you can make for your teeth and gums. It comes boasting 10 pressure settings, a 22-ounce removable reservoir, and 7 included tips so one device can cover your entire family/household.

items.summary:
Right alongside the $150 Valentine’s Day Sale savings we’re seeing on Whisker’s newer Litter-Robots, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the Litter-Robot 3 Connect at $499 shipped over at Amazon, which has been discontinued from the brand’s direct website. This older model usually keeps to its $549 full price, though we did see a large period of time of it keeping down at this same rate at Amazon from November through to the new year. Now, the deal is returning, giving you a $50 markdown to the lowest price we have tracked that I personally loved and recommend following my original hands-on review back in 2024. You can also shop the newer models that start from $599 here.
